1.content: Today is December 21, 2012 and the changes have started. What type of transformation would the people on Earth would experience?
1.title: December 21, 2012

11.content: Everyone in the word grew older. Which gender though?
11.title: Age Progression

12.content: Everyone in the world grew younger. Which gender though?
12.title: Age Regression

122.content:
Alright now do they shrink
1/5 of their age (a 50 year old becomes 10)
1/10 of their age (s 50 year old becomes 5)
1/12 of their age (a 36 year old becomes 3)
122.title: Women

1223.content:
Are you sure you want to go with this or would you rather it be
1/20 (a 60 year old becomes 3)
1/2 (a 50 year old becomes 25)

12232.content:
Now do we follow

Gretchen: an 80 year old grandmother of 5 (oldest 20, youngest 6)

Or

Susan: a 40 year-old mother of 3 (oldest 16, youngest 5)

13.content: Everyone in the world gets turned into an animal. Which gender though?
13.title: Animal Transformation

133.content: Does everybody transform into a mythical or a non-mythical creature?
133.title: Both

1332.content: Which non-mythical creature does men and women turn into
1332.title: Non-mythical

14.content: Everyone turned into an anthro hybrid. Which gender though?
14.title: Anthro Transformation

143.content: Does everybody turn into an anthro mythical creature or an anthro non-mythical creature?
143.title: Both

1432.content:
You sit in your bed, in the middle class suburb you call a home, watching the evening news. The breaking logo appears at the bottom of your television, and generally as a 17 year old boy this caught your attention. The screen goes to a female news anchor as she speaks into the camera "Good evening, Los Angles. Today is the supposed end of the world, and we have the countdown clock. So here we go!" You groan as you watch the screen. It was obviously some massive publicity stunt.

"30, 29, 28," you here the woman start up as you sort of felt dizzy. "10, 9, " is spoken on the television as you barely hold on to conscious. You can not hold it back any longer and pass out on your sheets.

Your dreams were hazy and lifelike, as you slowly opened your eyes feeling quite strange. The news is still on, and the anchoress wakes up as well, except something was way different! The former middle aged woman was now a Tigress standing 6'3.

She spoke "It appears if we're getting news that a strange way has passed over the world, changing people into respective animal hybrids." She growled as she looked down at her new body.

You start to freak out as you look down at your new body and see
1432.title: Anthro Non-Mythical

143211.content: You are terrified as you look at your four inch tall body. You were half mouse now! You had fur, large ears and a tail! Terrified, you start your descent down the stairs and into the living room where you see your family gathering.
143211.title: A mouse

1432111.content:
Your mother appears to be a lioness, standing tall next to your Wolfess sister. You walk into the room and squeal for their attention.

Your mother looks down and says to your sister "Hey Jess! Look at your brother!" She bento over to grab you whenever
1432111.title: They are all strong

15.content: What are your other options.
15.title: More Choices

151.content: Everyone in the world has turned into Inanimate Objects. Which ones though?
151.title: Inanimate Transformation

152.content: Everyone around the world change sizes. Which direction do they change?
152.title: Size (Big or Small)

1523.content: Only One Gender Change Sizes. Which one?
1523.title: One Gender Change Sizes

15231.content: All the men in the world change sizes. But do they grow big or small?
15231.title: Men

152312.content: Will they all shrink to the same size or shrink proportionately?
152312.title: Grow Smaller

1523121.content:
Following the Dec. 21, 2012 event (12/21/2012), all men on the planet found themselves either shrunk or in the process of shrinking down to the size of young grade-schoolers. Medical science could not explain it; the doomsayers could only cry aloud that it was the end of the world. And it was accepted as such.

The world that had existed before would never exist again, so they were right, in a way.

Many feminist women rejoiced at the new sexual dimorphism, a development that led many more men to respect the women around them. Hard not to respect someone bigger than you, am I right?

But there was the occasional faction that lorded their newfound size and strength over the men in their lives, bitter and with something to prove.

If we are indeed following the unchanged women of this world, shall we follow a helpful one or a vengeful one?
1523121.title: Shrink to the same size

15232.content: All the women in the world change sizes. But to do they grow big or smaller?
15232.title: Women

152322.content: Okay do they all shrink to the same size or do they shrink proportionally?
152322.title: Grow Smaller

153.content: Everyone in the world has changed genders. How does that happen?
153.title: Transgender

1531.content: The changes are a woman full of Amazon woman, muscled from miss fitness to fbb as well as brunette and red heads, no blonds, ethicities stay the same, the new women as adults stay no older than mid twenties children will age to adults stopping at mid twenties, all gain super intelligence, living in peace with no wars, hatred and getting along with advances in all the world, even the old become young and adjust to this change, this will become a new world
1531.title: A World Full of Women

info.brief_description: It's the end of the world, but not what the Mayans predicted
info.description:
On December 21, 2012, a Mayan prophecy proclaims that the world is going to end. Though the predictions were right, the world didn’t end. Instead the world changed in ways no one has ever seen coming. All across the globe, the human population went through a major metamorphosis that changed their future. Now they have to adapt to those changes and see what they can do from here on out. What are the changes they went through and how did they transform?

The rules are simple…

The list of transformations are found below

Age Progression (AP) – The person ages
Age Regression (AR) – The person grows younger
Animal Transformation – Person turns into an animal
Anthro Transformation – Person turns into an anthro animal hybrid, half human and half animal (Also called a Furry)
Inanimate Transformation – Person turns into an inanimate object
Growth – Person can grow in size
Shrink – A person can shrink in size
Transgender (TG) – The person changes gender whether it be male or female
Mix – A mixture of whatever is on the lift. Ex: TG/AR, TG/Animal etc.

There will be a variety of story choices involved in these transformations, most of it I will put in. If anyone has ideas in stories involving these transformations, they’re welcome to join in.

Sex and nudity is allowed in this story, but there will be no killing. Don’t want this story to be too violent.

And please, do not put any stories or chapters that isn’t related to this story or transformation. Don’t want to make things confusing for the readers. So please, try to make sure that what you’re writing is accurate from the transformation.

Other then all of that, have fun!
